key.name: current
key.description: The zero-based index into the input sources list specifying the current one in effect. The value is automatically capped to remain in the range [0, sources_length) as long as the sources list isn't empty.

key.name: sources
key.description: List of input source identifiers available. Each source is specified as a tuple of 2 strings. The first string is the type and can be one of 'xkb' or 'ibus'. For 'xkb' sources the second string is 'xkb_layout+xkb_variant' or just 'xkb_layout' if a XKB variant isn't needed. For 'ibus' sources the second string is the IBus engine name. An empty list means that the X server's current XKB layout and variant won't be touched and IBus won't be used.

key.name: xkb-options
key.description: List of XKB options. Each option is an XKB option string as defined by xkeyboard-config's rules files.

key.name: show-all-sources
key.description: Makes all installed input sources available for choosing in System Settings.

key.name: per-window
key.summary: Use different input sources for each window
key.description: When enabled, input sources get attached to the currently focused window when activated.
